name: df-irng
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(citr, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, ciun(s2, cfv(cmn1, co(cv(s0), cress, cv(s1))), cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the subring of elements of ` r ` integral over ` s ` in a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
